note-paragraph.CPC-specific-note: In this subclass non-limiting references (in the sense of paragraph 39 of the Guide to the IPC) may still be displayed in the scheme.

note.note-paragraph:
Group A42B1/00 is incomplete pending reclassification of documents from group A42B1/203.
Group A42B1/00 is also impacted by reclassification into groups A42B1/009, A42B1/011, A42B1/014, A42B1/017, A42B1/0175, A42B1/019, A42B1/0192 and A42B1/0195.
All groups listed in this Warning should be considered in order to perform a complete search.

title-part.text: External devices or supports adapted to retain the shape of hats, caps or hoods
convertible or adaptable for uses other than as headgear

note.note-paragraph:
Group A42B1/006 is incomplete pending reclassification of documents from group A42B1/206.
Groups A42B1/206 and A42B1/006 should be considered in order to perform a complete search.

title-part.text: with means for heating or cooling

reference.text: ventilating arrangements for head coverings A42C5/04

note.note-paragraph:
Group A42B1/009 is incomplete pending reclassification of documents from group A42B1/00.
Groups A42B1/00 and A42B1/009 should be considered in order to perform a complete search.

Group A42B1/011 is incomplete pending reclassification of documents from group A42B1/00.
Groups A42B1/00 and A42B1/011 should be considered in order to perform a complete search.

title-part.text: Sanitary or disposable, e.g. for use in hospitals or food industry
specially adapted for protection against insects

note.note-paragraph:
Group A42B1/014 is incomplete pending reclassification of documents from group A42B1/00.
Groups A42B1/00 and A42B1/014 should be considered in order to perform a complete search.

title-part.text: specially adapted for promoting health, e.g. with means for pressing on acupuncture points

note.note-paragraph:
Groups A42B1/017 and A42B1/0175 are incomplete pending reclassification of documents from group A42B1/00.
Groups A42B1/00, A42B1/017, and A42B1/0175 should be considered in order to perform a complete search.

title-part.text: with means for protecting the eyes, ears or nape, e.g. sun or rain shields
with air-inflated pads or removable linings

note.note-paragraph:
Group A42B1/018 is incomplete pending reclassification of documents from group A42B1/06.
All groups listed in this Warning should be considered in order to perform a complete search.

title-part.text: with means for protecting the eyes
with means for protecting the ears or nape

note.note-paragraph:
Group A42B1/0186 is impacted by reclassification into group A42B1/06.
All groups listed in this Warning should be considered in order to perform a complete search.

title-part.text: Removable protection for the nape, e.g. sun or rain shields
Protection for the ears, e.g. removable ear muffs

note.note-paragraph:
Groups A42B1/019 and A42B1/0195 are incomplete pending reclassification of documents from group A42B1/00.
Groups A42B1/00, A42B1/019 and A42B1/0195 should be considered in order to perform a complete search.

Group A42B1/0192 is incomplete pending reclassification of documents from groups A42B1/00 and A42B1/208.
Groups A42B1/00, A42B1/208 and A42B1/0192 should be considered in order to perform a complete search.

title-part.text: Peakless soft head coverings, e.g. turbans or berets

note.note-paragraph:
Group A42B1/041 is impacted by reclassification into group A42B1/049.
Groups A42B1/041 and A42B1/049 should be considered in order to perform a complete search.

title-part.text: fastened under the chin, e.g. bonnets

note.note-paragraph:
Group A42B1/045 is impacted by reclassification into groups A42B1/049 and A42B1/16.
Groups A42B1/045, A42B1/049 and A42B1/16 should be considered in order to perform a complete search.

reference.text: hair nets or hair-protecting caps A45D8/40

note.note-paragraph:
Group A42B1/049 is incomplete pending reclassification of documents from groups A42B1/041 and A42B1/045.
Groups A42B1/041, A42B1/045 and A42B1/049 should be considered in order to perform a complete search.

Group A42B1/06 is incomplete pending reclassification of documents from group A42B1/0186.
Group A42B1/06 is also impacted by reclassification into group A42B1/018.
All groups listed in this Warning should be considered in order to perform a complete search.

Group A42B1/16 is incomplete pending reclassification of documents from group A42B1/045.
Groups A42B1/045 and A42B1/16 should be considered in order to perform a complete search.

title-part.text: Coverings for protecting hats, caps or hoods against dust, rain, or sunshine

note.note-paragraph:
Group A42B1/201 is incomplete pending reclassification of documents from group A42B1/203.
Groups A42B1/203 and A42B1/201 should be considered in order to perform a complete search.

Group A42B1/203 is impacted by reclassification into groups A42B1/00, A42B1/201, A42B1/205, A42B1/206 and A42B1/208.
All groups listed in this Warning should be considered in order to perform a complete search.

Group A42B1/205 is incomplete pending reclassification of documents from group A42B1/203.
Groups A42B1/203 and A42B1/205 should be considered in order to perform a complete search.

reference.text: for uses other than as headgear A42B1/006

note.note-paragraph:
Group A42B1/206 is incomplete pending reclassification of documents from group A42B1/203.
Group A42B1/206 is also impacted by reclassification into group A42B1/006.
Groups A42B1/203, A42B1/206 and A42B1/006 should be considered in order to perform a complete search.

Group A42B1/208 is incomplete pending reclassification of documents from group A42B1/203.
Group A42B1/208 is also impacted by reclassification into group A42B1/0192.
Groups A42B1/203, A42B1/208 and A42B1/0192 should be considered in order to perform a complete search.

CPC-specific-text.text: ; Form-fitting or self adjusting head coverings; Devices for reducing hat size
with openings for hair

title-part.text: with means for attaching articles thereto, e.g. memorandum tablets or mirrors
Means for mounting detecting, signalling or lighting devices
Means for mounting audio or communication systems

reference.text: arrangements for supporting by headgear G02C3/02

title-part.text: Insignia, logos, emblems or the like

CPC-specific-text.text: ; Other protective head coverings
hoods for welders A61F9/06;
Helmet covers
Means for transporting or storing helmets

title-part.text: Parts, details or accessories of helmets

CPC-specific-text.text: Accessories for helmets
Anti-theft arrangements

reference.text: supporting arrangements specially adapted for fastening helmets B62J11/24; locks E05

CPC-specific-text.text: Optical devices
Rear view devices or the like
Detecting, signalling or lighting devices
Lighting devices, e.g. helmets with lamps
intended to light the way ahead
Signalling devices, e.g. auxiliary brake or indicator lights
Means for detecting hazards or accidents
Means for detecting that the user is wearing a helmet
Neck restraints
Hydration systems
Airbags
Aerodynamic helmets; Air guiding means therefor

title-part.text: Impact-absorbing shells, e.g. of crash helmets

CPC-specific-text.text: External coatings, e.g. with light reflective material
with reinforcing means
using layered structures
with relative movement between layers
Corrugated or ribbed shells
specially adapted for cycling helmets, e.g. for soft shelled helmets
with damage indication means
with preferential fracture zones
with soft external layer, e.g. for use in impact sports

title-part.text: Chin straps or similar retention devices

CPC-specific-text.text: Occipital retention systems
with additional protection for the neck

reference.text: protective garments for neck or shoulder area A41D13/0512

CPC-specific-text.text: with at least one layer or pad containing a fluid
inflatable
with at least one corrugated or ribbed layer
with a padded structure, e.g. foam
with removable or adjustable pads
with zones of different density
with restraining or stabilizing means, e.g. nape straps
Size adjustment devices
Anchoring means
Wind or noise deflectors
Integral hearing protection
Securing goggles or spectacles on helmet shells

title-part.text: Face guards, e.g. for ice hockey

CPC-specific-text.text: Chin protectors
Attaching visors to helmet shells, e.g. on motorcycle helmets
in an articulated manner, e.g. hinge devices
with means for locking the visor in a fully open, intermediate or closed position
with electrical actuation means
with full face protection, e.g. for industrial safety applications
with sunscreens, e.g. tinted or dual visor
with sun visors, e.g. peaks above face opening
for military or aviation applications

reference.text: protection helmets F41H1/04; breathing masks or helmets A62B18/00

title-part.text: with means for avoiding fogging or misting

CPC-specific-text.text: using means for heating, e.g. electric heating of the visor
; Movable or interchangeable vision films or sheets
Air ducting systems
Air inlets or outlets, with or without closure shutters
with additional heating or cooling means
with forced flow, e.g. by a fan
with means for attaching respirators or breathing masks

title-part.text: Mounting radio sets or communication systems

CPC-specific-text.text: Communication between riders or passengers
Audio entertainment systems
; Helmets with movable parts, e.g. adjustable
Collapsible helmets
Adjustable helmets
Helmets with movable or separable chin or jaw guard
with means to facilitate removal, e.g. after an accident
